item.title: Fall 2021: Math 170, Ideas in Mathematics
item.description: Key info Lectures: MWF, 1:45pm-2:45pm Instructor: Truong-Son Van, Email: tsvan+170@sas.upenn.edu, Office: DRL 3N8C Office Hours (Instructor): TBD TA: TBD, Office Hours (TA): Homework Due: Midterm: Final: Prerequisites: being curious. Textbook and References Course description Learning objective Personally, I hope this course will help you have fun and nerdy conversations with friends (or strangers on the bus), whether they’re math people or not. At the least, if you don’t like the awkward silence, strike a conversation about $\infty$!
